name: Multitask
description:
THIS ISN'T THE FINAL VERSION, SO I'M HAPPY TO GET FEEDBACK!

This game was made in seven days for the "GeoJam” by allesman. Of course it isn’t perfect, but this was my second Game Jam and I'm happy with how it turned out! Also, I know the connection to the theme is veeeery loose,  but I just wasn't able to think of anything else.

If you ever get stuck, you can watch the walkthrough!

Developer & Coder

 - allesman

Playtesters

Play Testers
